title: laminar_listener.py: The TR-001 Network Sniffer and Jitter Analysis Tool
description: Open-source implementation of the TR-001 Laminar Listener. This script provides the mathematical and network-level verification required to detect the 1.12 Floor and 1.81 Equilibrium in autonomous agents and hardware substrates. It functions as the primary enforcement tool for the Integrity Public License (v2.0).
